hotels.title: Contemporary Melbourne Glen Waverley Stay with Indoor Heated Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Positioned in Melbourne's Glen Waverley district, this stylish hotel has everything you need to turn your Melbourne visit into an absolute delight. Take a refreshing dip in the indoor heated pool, get your sweat on at the fitness centre or savour Indian and Middle Eastern fare at the inviting Meze Restaurant. Just 40 minutes from the CBD, the best of Melbourne is on your doorstep. Stroll to the nearby Glen Waverley dining and shopping hub, jump in the car for a quick 25-minute jaunt to the stunning Dandenong Ranges, and when you're ready to hit the town, world-class galleries, nightlife and performance venues are an easy commute.
